amendment.description: Amendment requires the Coast Guard to cooperate with local communities in which multimission small boat stations are scheduled for closure to develop an appropriate transition plan to ensure that maritime safety needs will continue to be met.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the Coast Guard to cooperate with local communities in which multimission small boat stations are scheduled for closure to develop an appropriate transition plan to ensure that maritime safety needs will continue to be met.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
